alerts.incomplete_board: The board is not filled out completely.

rules.title: Game Rules
rules.rule1: Every square has to contain a single number.
rules.rule2: Only the numbers from 1 through to 9 can be used.
rules.rule3: Each 3Ã—3 box can only contain each number from 1 to 9 once.
rules.rule4: Each vertical column can only contain each number from 1 to 9 once.
rules.rule5: Each horizontal row can only contain each number from 1 to 9 once.
